title: Marketing site content expansion: Customer Reviews, Pests page, and Treatment Process details

requirements.summary: Add a responsive Customer Reviews (testimonials) section to the Home page using static review cards with star ratings.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page includes a clearly labeled "Customer Reviews" section.
At least 6 testimonials are displayed as consistent cards (name + rating + review text; service type optional).
Section is responsive (looks good on mobile and desktop) and matches the siteâ€™s existing visual theme.
No backend is required to view testimonials (static content is acceptable).

file_operations.description: Create a reusable Customer Reviews section component rendering a responsive grid of testimonial cards (reviewer name, star rating, review text, optional service type). Use shadcn-ui Card primitives for consistent styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add a static testimonials data module (at least 6 entries) to keep Home page content clean and ensure no backend dependency.

Wire the new CustomerReviewsSection into the Home page with a clearly labeled "Customer Reviews" heading, placed in an appropriate marketing flow and styled to match existing sections. Ensure mobile/desktop responsiveness. Use existing shadcn-ui components already used on the page (e.g., Card/Button); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Create a new Pests & Insects page at /pests with a responsive pest info grid and add header/footer navigation links to it.
acceptanceCriteria: A new route/page exists at a clear URL (e.g., /pests) and is accessible from both the SiteHeader navigation and SiteFooter quick links.
The page includes a grid/list of common pests/insects where each item includes: name, how to identify, typical signs, and basic prevention tips (English text).
The page uses existing UI components and styling conventions (cards/sections) and is responsive.
Existing routes (Home/Services/About/Contact) continue to work unchanged.

file_operations.description: Create the "Pests & Insects" page with a clear hero/intro and a responsive grid/list of pests (e.g., cockroaches, termites, mosquitoes, bed bugs, ants, rodents). Each pest item must include name, identification notes, typical signs, and prevention tips (English). Use shadcn-ui Card for consistent presentation; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add a static pests/insects content module that supplies the Pests page grid/list data (name, identification, signs, prevention tips) to keep the page component focused on layout.
Register the new /pests route in the TanStack Router route tree and wire it to the new PestsPage component, ensuring existing routes remain unchanged.

Add a "Pests & Insects" navigation link (e.g., label "Pests") pointing to /pests in both desktop and mobile navigation, keeping active-state styling consistent. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add a "Pests & Insects" quick link to /pests within the footer navigation area, matching existing link styling and layout. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Expand the Services page with a structured "Our Treatment Process" section and clear safety notes in plain English.
acceptanceCriteria: Services page includes a dedicated section describing the end-to-end treatment process in clear steps.
Services page includes safety guidance (e.g., preparation before treatment, aftercare, child/pet considerations) written in plain English.
Content is presented in a structured, scannable layout (cards, numbered steps, or accordions) consistent with the current design system.
No backend changes are required for these additional details.

file_operations.description: Create a structured "Our Treatment Process" section component presenting the steps (inspection, identification, treatment, prevention, follow-up) in a scannable layout (e.g., numbered cards/steps) consistent with the current theme. Use shadcn-ui Card primitives where appropriate; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a safety notes section component covering family/pet safety, preparation guidance, aftercare, and eco-friendly options in plain English, using a scannable layout consistent with existing sections. Use shadcn-ui Card primitives where appropriate; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire TreatmentProcessSection and SafetyNotesSection into the Services page in a logical position (after service listings and/or before the closing CTA), ensuring the layout remains responsive and consistent with the existing design system. Use existing shadcn-ui components already used on the page (Card/Button); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
